# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper mining drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of a burner-mining-drill at position (41.0, -82.0) with status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL.

### Stone furnace at position (41.0, -80.0)
Consists of a stone-furnace at position (41.0, -80.0) with status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL.

### Burner inserter at position (39.5, -79.5)
Consists of a burner-inserter at position (39.5, -79.5) with status EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS.

### Burner inserter at position (41.5, -78.5)
Consists of a burner-inserter at position (41.5, -78.5) with status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL.

### Stone furnace at position (60.0, -60.0)
Consists of a stone-furnace at position (60.0, -60.0) with status EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS.

### Offshore pump at position (106.5, -32.5)
Consists of an offshore-pump at position (106.5, -32.5) with status EntityStatus.WORKING.

### Boiler at position (111.5, -32.0)
Consists of a boiler at position (111.5, -32.0) with status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL.

### Steam engine at position (117.5, -30.5)
Consists of a steam-engine at position (117.5, -30.5) with status EntityStatus.NOT_CONNECTED.

### Pipe group at position (107.5, -34.5)
Consists of a pipe-group at position (107.5, -34.5) with status EntityStatus.EMPTY.

### Pipe group at position (105.5, -32.5)
Consists of a pipe-group at position (105.5, -32.5) with status EntityStatus.FULL_OUTPUT.

### Electricity group at position (114.5, -28.666666666666668)
Consists of an electricity-group at position (114.5, -28.666666666666668) with status EntityStatus.NOT_PLUGGED_IN_ELECTRIC_NETWORK.

### Belt group at position (40.5, -83.5)
Consists of a belt-group at position (40.5, -83.5) with status EntityStatus.EMPTY.

### Transport belt at position (63.5, -53.5)
Consists of a transport-belt at position (63.5, -53.5) with status EntityStatus.WORKING.

### Transport belt at position (64.5, -53.5)
Consists of a transport-belt at position (64.5, -53.5) with status EntityStatus.WORKING.

# ERROR TIPS
* Ensure that burner-mining-drills have fuel to operate.
* Ensure that stone-furnaces have fuel to operate.
* Ensure that burner-inserter has source items to operate.
* Ensure that offshore-pump is connected to a boiler to provide water.
* Ensure that boiler is connected to a steam-engine to provide power.
* Ensure that pipe-group is not empty and has a full output.
* Ensure that electricity-group is plugged into an electric network.
* Ensure that belt-group is not empty and has a full output.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
No important variables have been assigned.
